wikipedia_page.main: Sanjay Lal (born July 23, 1969) is an American football coach who is the wide receivers coach for the Jacksonville Jaguars of the National Football League (NFL). He previously served as an assistant coach for the Seattle Seahawks, Indianapolis Colts, Buffalo Bills, New York Jets, Oakland Raiders, and Dallas Cowboys.

response: * Sanjay Lal, wide receivers coach for the Dallas Cowboys
* Sanjay Lal, college and NFL football coach

Lofton became the wide receiver coach for the San Diego Chargers in 2002 and continued that role until he was fired on January 22, 2008.  Lofton was later announced as a candidate to become head coach for Oakland Raiders in 2007 but the job would later go to Lane Kiffin.  In 2008, the Raiders hired him as their wide receivers coach. On January 13, 2009, Lofton was let go by the Oakland Raiders and replaced by Sanjay Lal.

In 2017, Austin was hired by the Dallas Cowboys as a pro and college scouting intern. He described his role as an "advanced scout" who evaluated receivers and defensive backs. In January 2018, Austin was interviewed for a role as the Cowboys wide receivers coach, which eventually went to Sanjay Lal.
